title: Wupatki National Monument: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations          Piecing Together the History of a Navajo Family Explore the history of one Navajo family that lived in what is now Wupatki National Monument. The page includes images, transcripts, and sound files from an oral history interview.                        Wupatki Pueblo Drainage Repair and Backfill Project: 2010 Preservation Efforts at Wupatki National Monument  Duration:8 minutes, 26 seconds                                Historic Navajo Occupation of Wupatki national Monument Navajo Related Archeological Sites  Duration:11 minutes, 16 seconds                                Hopi / Diné Language Camp Hopi / Diné Language Enrichment Camp  Duration:1 minute, 48 seconds                                Wupatki Solstice Sunrise Enjoy a moment of quiet beauty as you watch the sunrise march to solstice at Wupatki National Monument. All images were taken within 48 hours of solstice unless otherwise noted.   Duration:1 minute, 53 seconds
